review:
Super movie, watched it so many times,it's so entertaining  the storyline keeps u gripped till the end.. songs too r acc.to the situation. Very nice songs loved all of them... Aditya's acting is so so good his expressions appearance n dialogues have won my heart
similar

Movie is entertaining. Parineeti and Aditya have done a great job. It has comedy romance and drama in it Suspense too. I loved it. One will not feel bore even for a single minute. Songs are also awesome
It is such a great movie. I love parineeti and aditya's comedy romance. All in all it is an awesome movie👍🏻❤must watch

I really liked it....it's a complete film .....and foodies will love it...there is desi romance....humour ..love..crisis..reunions...and they acted very well..in one word it's an awesome film....
I don't really care about box office they make nonsense films successful sometimes but this film is truly entertaining.
It is a movie for foodies 🍇🍈🍉i am one of them.🍟🍔🍕🍲🍿🌭🌮🍜🍝🍦🍧🍨☕🍥🍤eat and watch daawat-e-ishq
Great movie. Actor and actress there are great job in movie. I really love this movies.
Superbb movie...I loved it so much.. It's a complete movie..I felt completely satisfied after the climax..#daawat-e-ishqgoals
In simple words superb movie...... Just loved it, made my day, after long time seen such a paisa vasool movie.
